trans-unit.source: This attribute is applied to an XML Web service method or an XML Web service client to specify a SOAP header that the XML Web service method or XML Web service client can process.
trans-unit.target: 此特性应用于 XML Web services 方法或 XML Web services 客户端，用以指定该 XML Web services 方法或 XML Web services 客户端可以处理的 SOAP 标头。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The basic steps to receiving and processing a SOAP header are:
trans-unit.target: 基本步骤为接收和处理 SOAP 标头：

trans-unit.source: Create a class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> representing the data passed in the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 创建派生自的类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>表示数据的 SOAP 标头中传递。

trans-unit.source: Add a member to the XML Web service class or XML Web service client proxy class of the type created in step 1.
trans-unit.target: 将成员添加到 XML Web 服务类或在步骤 1 中创建的类型的 XML Web 服务客户端代理类。

trans-unit.source: Apply a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the XML Web service method or the corresponding method in the proxy class, specifying the member created in step 2 in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>到 XML Web service 方法或代理类中的相应方法，指定在步骤 2 中创建的成员<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Within the XML Web service method or XML Web service client code, access the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property to process the data sent in the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML Web service 方法或 XML Web 服务客户端代码中，访问<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性来处理的 SOAP 标头中发送的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> of type `MyHeader`.
trans-unit.target: 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义一个<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>类型的`MyHeader`。

trans-unit.source: The `Hello` XML Web service method requires the client to invoke the XML Web service method with this <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>.
trans-unit.target: `Hello` XML Web service 方法要求客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法与此<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>。

trans-unit.source: The `Hello` XML Web service also catches any SOAP headers other than `MyHeader`.
trans-unit.target: `Hello` XML Web 服务还捕获任何 SOAP 标头以外`MyHeader`。

trans-unit.source: The member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SOAP 标头内容的 XML Web services 类的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName" /> property will be set to the value of this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName" /> 属性将被设置为此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute" /> class, setting the member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置表示 SOAP 标头内容的 XML Web services 类的成员，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client or XML Web service can specify the SOAP headers it wants to process for specific XML Web service methods by applying a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the XML Web service method in the XML Web service class or the corresponding method in the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务客户端或 XML Web 服务可以指定它想要处理针对特定的 XML Web 服务方法通过应用对 SOAP 标头<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>到中的 XML Web 服务类或代理类中的相应方法的 XML Web 服务方法。

trans-unit.source: In order for the XML Web service method to receive the contents of the SOAP header, a member is added to the XML Web service class of a <xref:System.Type> derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 中要接收的 SOAP 标头的内容的 XML Web 服务方法的顺序，成员将添加到的 XML Web 服务类<xref:System.Type>派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, an XML Web service client adds a member to the proxy class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，XML Web 服务客户端将成员添加到派生自的代理类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>。

trans-unit.source: That <xref:System.Type> deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> represents the contents of the SOAP header and is created by the developer of the XML Web service or XML Web service client that wants to receive the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>派生从<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>表示 SOAP 标头的内容并且在创建 XML Web 服务或想要接收的 SOAP 标头的 XML Web 服务客户端的开发人员。

trans-unit.source: Once the class is created, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to the XML Web service method or corresponding method in the XML Web service client proxy class specifing the member to receive the SOAP header contents with the `memberName` parameter to this constructor or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 创建类后,<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>可以应用于 XML Web service 方法或 XML Web 服务客户端代理类后缀中与内容要接收的 SOAP 标头的成员的对应方法`memberName`此构造函数参数或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method can receive multiple SOAP headers by adding multiple members to the XML Web service class or the XML Web service proxy class and in turn applying multiple <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> attributes to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务方法可以通过将多个成员添加到的 XML Web 服务类或 XML Web 服务代理类并将其反过来应用多个接收多个 SOAP 标头<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>属性指向 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: To receive and process unknown SOAP headers at the time the XML Web service is written, specify the <xref:System.Type> of the member to be either <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> or an array of either class.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收并处理在编写 XML Web 服务的未知的 SOAP 标头，指定<xref:System.Type>的成员可以是以下之一<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>或其中一个类的数组。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> of type `MyHeader`.
trans-unit.target: 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义一个<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>类型的`MyHeader`。

trans-unit.source: The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies the `myHeader` member as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property to receive the contents of `MyHeader` SOAP headers passed into the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`myHeader`作为成员<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性中接收的内容`MyHeader`SOAP 标头传递到 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the SOAP header is intended for the XML Web service or the XML Web service client or both.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SOAP 标头是用于 XML Web services 还是 XML Web services 客户端，或同时用于二者。

trans-unit.source: The intended recipient of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 标头的预期接收者。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderDirection.In" />, which means the intended recipient is just the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderDirection.In" />，这意味着预期接收者只是 XML Web services。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> of type `MyHeader`.
trans-unit.target: 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义一个<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>类型的`MyHeader`。

trans-unit.source: The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies that `MyHeader` must be sent to the XML Web service method and the client to invocate the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`MyHeader`必须发送到 XML Web service 方法和客户端以 invocate XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示 SOAP 标头内容的 XML Web services 类的成员。

trans-unit.source: The member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SOAP 标头内容的 XML Web services 类的成员。

trans-unit.source: There is no default.
trans-unit.target: 没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service or XML Web service client can specify the SOAP headers it wants to process by applying a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the XML Web service method in the XML Web service class or the corresponding method in the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务或 XML Web 服务客户端可以指定它想要通过应用处理的 SOAP 标头<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>到中的 XML Web 服务类或代理类中的相应方法的 XML Web 服务方法。

trans-unit.source: In order for the XML Web service method to receive the contents of the SOAP header, a member is added to the XML Web service class of a type derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 在要接收的 SOAP 标头的内容的 XML Web 服务方法的顺序，成员添加到派生自的类型的 XML Web 服务类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, an XML Web service client adds a member to the proxy class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，XML Web 服务客户端将成员添加到派生自的代理类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> represents the contents of the SOAP header and is created by the developer of the XML Web service or XML Web service client that wants to receive the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>派生从<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>表示 SOAP 标头的内容并且在创建 XML Web 服务或想要接收的 SOAP 标头的 XML Web 服务客户端的开发人员。

trans-unit.source: Once the class is created, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to the XML Web service method or corresponding method in the XML Web service client proxy class specifying the member to receive the SOAP header contents with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 创建类后,<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>可以应用于 XML Web service 方法或指定要接收的 SOAP 标头内容的成员的 XML Web 服务客户端代理类中的相应方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method can receive multiple SOAP headers by adding multiple members to the XML Web service class or the XML Web service proxy class and in turn applying multiple <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> attributes to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务方法可以通过将多个成员添加到的 XML Web 服务类或 XML Web 服务代理类并将其反过来应用多个接收多个 SOAP 标头<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>属性指向 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: To receive and process unknown SOAP headers at the time the XML Web service is written, specify the type of the member to be either <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> or an array of either class.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收并在编写 XML Web 服务处理未知的 SOAP 标头，指定的成员可以是以下之一类型<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>或其中一个类的数组。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> of type `MyHeader`.
trans-unit.target: 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务定义一个<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>类型的`MyHeader`。

trans-unit.source: The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies the `myHeader` member as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property to receive the contents of `MyHeader` SOAP headers passed into the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`myHeader`作为成员<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性中接收的内容`MyHeader`SOAP 标头传递到 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此成员已经过时，不具有任何功能。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a SOAP header is sent to an XML Web service, confirm that the member specified in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证是否 SOAP 标头会发送到 XML Web 服务，确认成员中指定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If it is `null`, the SOAP header was not sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是`null`，未发送的 SOAP 标头。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.0 of the .NET Framework SDK, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Required%2A> property indicates whether a SOAP header must be understood and processed by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 在 1.0 版中的.NET Framework SDK，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Required%2A>属性指示是否必须理解并由接收方 XML Web 服务或 XML Web 服务客户端处理的 SOAP 标头。

trans-unit.source: If a recipient did not process the SOAP header an exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收方未处理的 SOAP 标头已引发异常。
